content:
The Sooner mens basketball team is not only praised for their performance on the court but also in the classroom PERIOD The basketball team was recognized by the National Association of Basketball Coaches NABC Wednesday with the Team Academic Excellence Award PERIOD

Junior forward Ryan Spangler gets the rebound during the game against Washburn University on Nov PERIOD  at Lloyd Noble Center PERIOD Spangler was number one in the Big  for rebounds last season PERIOD The Sooners beat the Ichabods  PERIOD

Sooners dont get to spend much time in Nebraska these days since the Cornhuskers bolted from the Big  but OU mens basketball will get the rare chance Wednesday in Omaha PERIOD

No PERIOD  Oklahoma  will face its first road test of the season when it takes on Creighton  from the Big East Conference PERIOD It will be a unique earlyseason challenge for the Sooners who are coming off a comfortable opening victory at home against Southeastern Louisiana PERIOD

Its a tough opponent tough environmentIt will be a big challenge PERIOD These are the games you work in preparation for. the environment Kruger referred to is an intimidating one PERIOD The Sooners will have to contend with an atmosphere that looks more like an NBA arena than a collegiate field house PERIOD More than  Bluejay fans will pack CenturyLink Center Wednesday for the primetime matchup and the urge for an upset will likely be on their minds PERIOD

Itll be a good barometer for where were at and what we still need to work on Kruger said PERIOD

Junior forward Ryan Spangler said that games like this are good for OUs younger players PERIOD

Its always good to open their eyes and show them what college basketball really is about Spangler said PERIOD

Wednesday well have some up and downs but I think it will just show us what we need to get better on. when it comes to tough environments success often depends on how tight the offense is from possession to possession PERIOD This is where sophomore Jordan Woodard comes in PERIOD

As the Sooners floor general at point guard it will be Woodards job to control the tempo and keep his teammates calm when the fans get loud PERIOD

Turnovers are going to lead to fast breaks and thats really what gets the crowd into it  when they see their players moving up and down Woodard said PERIOD

We just have to make sure were making shots and not turning the ball over and well be fine. the Bluejays are off to a solid start this year trying to follow up a  season that was one of the best in the history of the program PERIOD They went  on the year and  in their first season as members of the Big East good for second in the conference PERIOD How far Creighton goes this year however will depend on how they replace Doug McDermott  last seasons National Player of the Year PERIOD

Guard Austin Chatman is the only returning starter for a Creighton squad that will have to find scoring depth if they hope to maintain success in a competitive Big East PERIOD

Tipoff time is  p.m PERIOD Wednesday and FOX Sports  will carry the broadcast PERIOD

title: Men's basketball confident heading into Omaha Wednesday | Sports | oudaily.com
name: University of Oklahoma
